posts.post_content: Looking for N172/N173 OJ, period individual/team cabinet photo, scorebook, signature, etc.  Please email me at [url]jpcw1999@yahoo.com[/url] if you can bring yourself to part with your Harry Wright item.  Thanks, Jeremy

I'm starting to feel a little bit desperate here.  I was hoping that I wouldn't have to bust out the "top dollar paid" or the "most discriminating want list" thing, but I find myself still looking for Wright objects. If you can help, it would be incredibly appreciated.  I have some decent trade items available also, assuming that you don't want to sell.  Please let me know.  Jeremy

Jeremy, don't get excited.  I don't have any Wright items, sounds like a tough task.  I wish I did, you probably have some Detroit N172/N173 that I could use.

Good Luck

Joe
